name: In Your Words Showcase
description:
What does a city remember—and what do we remember of a city?

This question prompted our search for the perspectives of young writers and poets from across the city. After a mentorship session with publisher Jayapriya Vasudevan and writer and poet Abhishek Annica, a selection of these young artists are ready to present their work to the public. Exploring the city, the idea of home, memory and movement through prose and poetry.

Join us for a public reading and showcase of their work.
